title: Kindly Measured
text: Kindly Measured is a small collection of things I’ve explored and enjoyed in daily life. I like treating everyday life as something you can observe with both warmth and precision, so I often pair notes and reflections with simple data—time logs, progress trackers, and small experiments. Looking through a data lens helps me notice patterns I might otherwise miss, ask better questions, challenge myself gently, and understand this beautiful yet confusing world a little more clearly.

title: Yin Gu
text:
Yin has lived in a few different places—China, Malaysia, France, and now the United States. She’s sensitive to cultural variations and values how different experiences shape the way people think. With extensive experience working with data, she’s drawn to automation tools, data-driven insights, and the kind of curiosity that turns ordinary moments into something worth noticing.
